title: Heretic Episode 3 [8:13] In-Game [9:17] (RTA)
description: Done on Smite-Meister difficulty. The world record for this category was 8:27 In-game by PerOxyd, so this run is faster than that, but stx-Vile did a run on Nightmare that was 8:01 In-game. So the fact that the Nightmare record is faster than Ultra-Violence (basically) is pretty damn silly. But that's stx-Vile for ya.
